column4: you will get full 3D acceleration (modulo S3TC, which you can patch in externally if you're adventurous) for all ATI cards up to 9200 (i.e. all r1xx/r2xx chipsets) with the free drivers
in terms of quality and ease of use, fglrx is crap, so you should steer clear of it unless you really, really need it.
even then, start from the point of view of 'i do not need this driver'.
every 2D card on the market is supported by the free drivers
